 advice to practising dentists and their teams. Based on information achieved through the doctor portal of the doctor's preferred clear aligner system (Invisalign, ClearCorrect, SureSmile, Spark), AlignerService offers tentative orthodontic diagnostics, orthodontic
 treatment planning, optimization of digital treatment plans, and treatment support. 





 
AlignerService never has physical contact with the
 patients or the doctor. As a consequence, neither AlignerService nor its employees can take any responsibility for the treatment outcomes. 

 
Any clear aligner software represents planned tooth
 movements based on a digital setup and does not reflect actual tooth movements; tooth movement data should be used as a reference only. The doctor is solely responsible for prescribing and administering orthodontic treatment and maintaining all patient medical
 records. 

 
Treatment Planning Services received from AlignerService
 shall only be considered as recommendations and the ultimate decision on whether or not to apply the Treatment Planning Services or to adapt them to the conditions of the specific patient remains with the treating doctor.

Agent replied: 'Kære RedaTusind tak for din mail og spørgsmål.Jeg syntes ikke en case kan vurderes som simple når der skal udføres IPR, da IPR ikke er simpelt at udfører.Derfor er kategorien moderat egentlig meget stor.Det er ikke nødvendigvis bevægelserne der skal laves, når man laver IPR, der gør casen moderat men ofte udførelsen af IPR.Trangstillingen i UK er ikke så udfordrende, men man bliver nød til at se på helheden og hvordan det kan behandlse. Vi skal jo gerne have kæbe halvdelene til at passe sammen.Vi skal også huske at tage højde for profilen og biotypen. Når der er flere aspekter der skal tages højde for, bliver behandlingen og planlægningen også mere komplex end bare simpel.Når jeg planlægger en case tager jeg højde for alle de faktorere, da jeg jo har erfaring dermed, har jeg en rotine i hvordan jeg gør det.Jeg finder så den løsning jeg finder vil være den mest forudsigelige med de givende rammer, og så informere om konsekvenserne fx som i denne case. at mellemrum ikke lukkes helt trods meget IPR i modsatte kæbe, og der vil være en øget risiko for tracking issues især på tænder med store rotationer og eller extrusioner.Jeg håber det giver mening.Book releaseMastering Aligner Orthodontics: A Guide for General DentistsCan be ordered at:Mastering Aligner Orthodontics | AlignerService.comOr buy directly on Amazonhttps://a.co/d/4pXzb1SKind regards / Venlig hilsen / Mit freundlichen Grüßen Helle Hatt DDSHelle@alignerservice.comAlignerservice.com-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------DisclaimerAlignerService consists of dentists and orthodontists with extensive clear aligner experience giving clinical advice to practising dentists and their teams. --------------- Original Message ---------------From: Helle Hatt [helle@alignerservice.com]Sent: 06/05/2025, 16:51To: cs-nordics@aligntech.comSubject: Vivera passer ikke





You don't often get email from helle@alignerservice.com.  Learn why this is important






CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

Jeg har lige bestil vivera til patient #14190567.
 
Patienten har brugt vivera ind til nu (1. omgang), og skal blot have dem fornyet.
 
Jeg har bestilt ud fra sidst ongang, da de ikke fejlet nogt.
Jeg kan nu kun få en warrenty hvis jeg tager nyt scan. Det er jeg ikke interesseret i.
Kan jeg ikke få lavet nogle ny vivera på garanti uden scan?
 
Skinnerne kan ikke gå mere på den dette, og patienten føler ikke at det er fordi de strammer.
 
 







Kind regards / Venlig hilsen / Mit freundlichen Grüßen Helle Hatt DDS
 
Helle@alignerservice.com

Customer asked: 'Hello Helle,




Will it be possible to solve the proklination in the upper jaw so I can change 11,12,21 later, the crowns?




Wishing you a lovely Friday.




Ban



Sent from Outlook for Android

From: Helle Hatt <helle@alignerservice.com>
Sent: Friday, May 9, 2025 5:11:30 PM
To: Ban Jamil <ban.jamil@ptj.se>
Subject: [Extern avsändare] Re: Case # 2103725
 



Dear Ban



The setup on #2103725 is now ready for your approval.



There is IPR posterior on the upper arch to solve the crowding in the front.

IPR in the lower to minimise the risk of gingival recessions.



I have not placed an engager on 12 due to the crown. So please keep an eye on the slight extrusion on that tooth.







Please remember to instruct the patient to chew the aligners firmly onto their teeth, including the engagers, and to wear them for at least 22 hours a day. This will help minimise any tracking issues. I also recommend that the patient chews on the aligners
 using the back end of a toothbrush or chewies three times a day for five minutes to assist with the intrusion.




Please
 let me know if you have any questions.



I
 wish you a lovely weekend.
































Book release

subject: Opstart efter retrograd/ endo
content:
Customer asked: 'Hej Helle 

Jeg har en to cases vi skal i gang med. Med desværre fandt jeg apikale opklaringer på OTP. Den ene er på -2 så den har fået lavet endo. Den anden er på en rodbeh.molar  så det bliver en retrograd fyldning, og så er mit spørgsmål hvor langt tid skal der gå før jeg må sætte gang i CC beh? Den sidste er en molar der ikke skal flyttes med. 
Håber du vil hjælpe lidt her. Tak 🙏 

Med venlig hilsen
Winnie Schack'
Customer asked: 'Hej igen. Tak for svar.Først er det helt korrekt at fakturaerne er til forskellige klinikker, dog er det Dentalklinikken under et. Dernæst beklager jeg selvfølgelig voldsomt at de endnu ikke er blevet betalt trods min opfordring. Jeg ved vores bogholder er blevet langtids sygemeldt og en ny skulle køres ind, men der har tilsyneladende været nogle mangler i denne opstart. Jeg håber virkelig fremadrettet alt kører som det plejer. Du er meget velkommen til at sende endnu en rykker til vores bogholderi så håber jeg at der snart sker noget. 🤞🏼Med venlig hilsenWinnie SchackDen 8. maj 2025 kl. 13.07 skrev Helle Hatt <helle@alignerservice.com>:﻿Hej WinnieTak for din mail.Jeg venter typisk 3-6 måneder efter endo inden jeg srater med at flyyte på tænderne.Molaren der ikke skal flyttes på og har fået retrograd, er dog lidt i en gråzone. Det burde ikke være noget problem at flytte på den. Det der er udfordringen er hvis der er infektion i knoglen, vil tandbevægelserne i forbindelse med regulering provokere infektionen og mindske heling (hvis der stadig er lidt infektion).Jeg håber det hjælper.Jeg har dog et spørgsmål til dig.Jeg kan se at vi har to faktura på to cases jeg har hjulpet med. Der er dog sitlet til hver sin klinik og ikke blevet betalt endnu.Er det korrekt?Vi du tjekke op på betalingen og sørge for de bliver betalt.Jeg har vedhæftet faktura.Tusind tak.Book releaseMastering Aligner Orthodontics: A Guide for General DentistsCan be ordered at:Mastering Aligner Orthodontics | AlignerService.comOr buy directly on Amazonhttps://a.co/d/4pXzb1SKind regards / Venlig hilsen / Mit freundlichen Grüßen Helle Hatt DDSHelle@alignerservice.comAlignerservice.com-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------DisclaimerAlignerService consists of dentists and orthodontists with extensive clear aligner experience giving clinical advice to practising dentists and their teams. Hej Jesper og Helle

Jeg har en patient, som jeg her vil have jer til at vurdere mht aligner behandling.

Jeg har sendt den til Elysee, men de synes, at jeg skal sende den videre til jer.


Min patient er en ung pige med trangstilling. Lidt i fronten og mere spec i hs ved præmolarer.


Hun ønsker at få en regelmæssig alignet front i ok og uk. 

Så vi er interesseret i om det kan lade sig gøre med alignere, eller det er nødvendigt med fast apparatur.


Hun er lagt op på Trioclear submission platformen.

subject: Hjelp med CC case 2092919
content:
Customer asked: 'Hei og takk for tilbakemelding! Ønsker gjerne hjelp fra deg i juni da jeg fortsatt er i prosessen med å lære å redigere, så vil gjerne ha litt mer erfaring før jeg retter setup selv.Mvh Victoria Bjørnland Stokke8. mai 2025 kl. 10:57 skrev Helle Hatt <tps@alignerservice.com>:﻿Hej VictoriaDet vil være mig en fornøjelse at hjælpe med denne case.Jeg starter med at give dig lidt klinisk support, da kvoten for behandlings planlægningshjælp (TPS) for maj er opbrugt.Æstetikken kan forbedre i fronten, men det kommer også til at være en kombination med lidt besklibning af incisal kanterne især på 11,21Der mangler engagers til at hjælpe med nogle af forflytningerne. ISær rotationer i OK front.Biotypen er lidt tynd, så jeg vil anbefale at bede teknikkerne om ikke at lave buccal translation af UK front, men kun buccal krone kipning.Dette kan hjælpe dig med selv at prøve at rette setuppet til.Du er selvfølgelig også velkommen til at vente til Juni, da patienten ikke vil i gang før alligevel.Og der er også altid den mulighed at du selv betaler for min hejælp til behandlingsplanlægningen.Sig endelig til hvad der passer dig bedst.Book releaseMastering Aligner Orthodontics: A Guide for General DentistsCan be ordered at:Mastering Aligner Orthodontics | AlignerService.comOr buy directly on Amazonhttps://a.co/d/4pXzb1SKind regards / Venlig hilsen / Mit freundlichen Grüßen Helle Hatt DDSHelle@alignerservice.comAlignerservice.com-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------DisclaimerAlignerService consists of dentists and orthodontists with extensive clear aligner experience giving clinical advice to practising dentists and their teams. Based on information achieved through the doctor portal of the doctor's preferred clear aligner system (Invisalign, ClearCorrect, SureSmile, Spark), AlignerService offers tentative orthodontic diagnostics, orthodontic treatment planning, optimization of digital treatment plans, and treatment support. AlignerService never has physical contact with the patients or the doctor. As a consequence, neither AlignerService nor its employees can take any responsibility for the treatment outcomes. Any clear aligner software represents planned tooth movements based on a digital setup and does not reflect actual tooth movements; tooth movement data should be used as a reference only. The doctor is solely responsible for prescribing and administering orthodontic treatment and maintaining all patient medical records. Treatment Planning Services received from AlignerService shall only be considered as recommendations and the ultimate decision on whether or not to apply the Treatment Planning Services or to adapt them to the conditions of the specific patient remains with the treating doctor. AlignerService shall not become liable for any damages, claims, liabilities, etc. that may result or arise in context with the Treatment Planning Services provided to the doctor.Clear aligner therapy is unpredictable. AlignerService does not guarantee a successful treatment outcome. Individual results will vary.---- on Thu, 08 May 2025 09:53:02 +0200  "Victoria Bjørnland"<victoria.bjornland@gmail.com>  wrote ---- Hei, 
Jeg har en pasient som ønsker behandling med clear correct, men ikke før etter sommeren. Så kunne du hjulpet meg med denne casen?

Så lenge den er klar til uke 37 er det fint! 

Mvh Victoria Bjørnland Stokke'

ISær rotationer i OK front.Biotypen er lidt tynd, så jeg vil anbefale at bede teknikkerne om ikke at lave buccal translation af UK front, men kun buccal krone kipning.Dette kan hjælpe dig med selv at prøve at rette setuppet til.Du er selvfølgelig også velkommen til at vente til Juni, da patienten ikke vil i gang før alligevel.Og der er også altid den mulighed at du selv betaler for min hejælp til behandlingsplanlægningen.Sig endelig til hvad der passer dig bedst.Book releaseMastering Aligner Orthodontics: A Guide for General DentistsCan be ordered at:Mastering Aligner Orthodontics | AlignerService.comOr buy directly on Amazonhttps://a.co/d/4pXzb1SKind regards / Venlig hilsen / Mit freundlichen Grüßen Helle Hatt DDSHelle@alignerservice.comAlignerservice.com-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------DisclaimerAlignerService consists of dentists and orthodontists with extensive clear aligner experience giving clinical advice to practising dentists and their teams. Based on information achieved through the doctor portal of the doctor's preferred clear aligner system (Invisalign, ClearCorrect, SureSmile, Spark), AlignerService offers tentative orthodontic diagnostics, orthodontic treatment planning, optimization of digital treatment plans, and treatment support. AlignerService never has physical contact with the patients or the doctor. As a consequence, neither AlignerService nor its employees can take any responsibility for the treatment outcomes. Any clear aligner software represents planned tooth movements based on a digital setup and does not reflect actual tooth movements; tooth movement data should be used as a reference only. AlignerService does not guarantee a successful treatment outcome. Individual results will vary.---- on Thu, 08 May 2025 09:53:02 +0200  "Victoria Bjørnland"<victoria.bjornland@gmail.com>  wrote ---- Hei,

Mvh Victoria Bjørnland Stokke'

subject: Re:[## 1578735 ##] Zia and AI integration
content:
Customer asked: 'Hello Helle,Thank you for contacting Zoho Desk Support.We apologize for any inconvenience caused while trying to use ChatGPT in Zoho Desk. Please note that ChatGPT or ZIA generates responses based only on the current email thread and relevant knowledge base articles, and not on previous ticket conversations due to technical difficulties.
If the response generated is incorrect or the suggested article is not relevant, kindly share a screen recording from any test ticket so that our engineering team can review the issue further.Sincerely,Merlin John | Zoho DeskHow happy are you with our service?Loved it. Thanks! T ...OkayIt was bad. Sorry!  ...Support contact email has been changed to support@eu.zohodesk.com, please send us your future queries to our new email address.           Blogs · Forums · Help---- on Thu, 08 May 2025 20:57:56 +0530  "Helle Hatt"<helle@alignerservice.com>  wrote ---- Dear SupportWe have read all of your articles about Zia and ChatGPT OpenAI. How we can integrate it to our Zoho desk.
It looked very promising, like it was something that we could really benefit from.
We started to update our knowledge base with concise and relevant articles.
We have upgraded our Zoho desk subscription to enterprise to be able to get all of these new cool features.
We have installed the chatGPT help extension, enabled chatGPT with an API code as our generative AI.
When we go into the tickets and want to test the new cool features we got really disappointed. We find out that chatGPT or Zia can only draw from one article in KB and not combine multiple articles. As well as getting the knowledge that they cannot learn from all of our previous tickets, incoming and agent replies.
So this is really disappointing when we reading a lot of your articles that Zia would be able to get information from previous tickets and us that in helping generating new reply.
We have now learnt that we need a RAG (retrieval-Augmented Generation) integration to be able to extract all of the information from Zoho desk, then put it into a prompt and ChatGPT that then returns a more sufficient and useful answer that our agent can use in the ticket reply to our customers.
It seems as it is more working as a search engine base and not the artificial intelligence tool.
It could be that we have missunderstood something from your articles. However, we are not able to find any articles clarifying this or how to set up Zoho desk in a way that we get what we understand from your articles about Zia.What we need and want.This is the answer I got when I asked ChatGPTI know it is not always correct but it could still be helpfull.using Zoho Desk and want ChatGPT to help optimize support replies by learning from:✅ Your Knowledge Base articles, and✅ Your past support tickets.You're looking for a smarter assistant that can generate better replies by referencing multiple KB articles and past support examples — not just one article at a time.🧠 The ChallengeZoho Desk’s built-in ChatGPT integration (via Generative AI or ChatGPT Helper) is limited:It pulls content mostly from a single KB article at a time.It doesn’t learn from past tickets.It can’t combine multiple KB articles unless you manually feed that information.To do what you're asking — use both KBs and previous tickets — you need a custom AI setup outside of (or alongside) Zoho Desk.✅ What You Want = Custom Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)You’d build (or integrate) a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system that works like this:🔁 Custom AI Workflow:Your user submits a ticket in Zoho Desk.A connected system:🧾 Searches your entire Knowledge Base📨 Retrieves relevant past tickets and agent repliesIt sends that relevant content as context into a ChatGPT promptChatGPT generates a high-quality, context-aware reply.Your agent can review, edit, and send it.So my questions is how do we get what we want and is it at all possible?Thank you.
Kind regards / Venlig hilsen / Mit freundlichen Grüßen Helle Hatt DDSHelle@alignerservice.comAlignerservice.com'
Customer asked: 'Hello Helle,Thank you for sharing your detailed feedback regarding the ChatGPT/Zia integration in Zoho Desk. We truly appreciate your insights and understand the expectations you've outlined regarding AI capabilities especially around context-aware response generation and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).
At present, the Zia AI integration primarily leverages information from the current ticket thread and individual knowledge base (KB) articles to suggest responses. It does not yet support deep contextual synthesis across multiple KB articles or historical tickets. This means that its capabilities are closer to guided suggestions than full generative AI functionality with broad contextual understanding.
We understand this may not fully align with your expectations based on the marketing or documentation, and we sincerely apologize for any confusion caused. Our teams are actively working on evolving our AI offerings, and capabilities like RAG-based response generation and deeper contextual learning are areas under consideration for future development.We will get back to you incase of an any update. Please note that we do not have time frame for future enhancement/development requests.Sincerely,Merlin John | Zoho DeskHow happy are you with our service?Loved it. Thanks! T ...OkayIt was bad. Sorry!  ...Support contact email has been changed to support@eu.zohodesk.com, please send us your future queries to our new email address.           Blogs · Forums · Help    ---- on Fri, 09 May 2025 16:26:22 +0530  "Helle Hatt"<helle@alignerservice.com>  wrote ---- Dear MerlinThank you for your response.However, I would like to clarify that what we are currently experiencing with the ChatGPT/Zia integration in Zoho Desk does not align with what we understood from your documentation and marketing materials. Our expectation was to benefit from an AI system capable of intelligently generating responses by learning from our entire knowledge base andpast support tickets — not just from a single article or the current ticket thread.Based on our testing, the system appears to operate more like a basic keyword-based suggestion tool or a traditional machine learning model — not a true AI assistant. It lacks the ability to retrieve and synthesize information from multiple KB articles and prior ticket history to deliver a more context-aware and helpful response.In short, what is currently available seems limited to surface-level suggestions, not the kind of intelligent automation and understanding that generative AI — particularly Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems — are capable of. If Zoho Desk does not support this kind of setup natively, it would be very helpful if you could confirm this clearly so we can explore alternatives or consider building our own integration.We believe in the potential of AI to improve support workflows, but without the ability to draw on comprehensive context, this solution falls short of what we — and likely many other enterprise users — need.Looking forward to your clarification.Book releaseMastering Aligner Orthodontics: A Guide for General DentistsCan be ordered at:Mastering Aligner Orthodontics | AlignerService.comOr buy directly on Amazonhttps://a.co/d/4pXzb1SKind regards / Venlig hilsen / Mit freundlichen Grüßen Helle Hatt DDSHelle@alignerservice.comAlignerservice.com-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------DisclaimerAlignerService consists of dentists and orthodontists with extensive clear aligner experience giving clinical advice to practising dentists and their teams. AlignerService does not guarantee a successful treatment outcome. subject: Spørgsmål til aligner beh.
content:
Customer asked: 'Hej HelleJeg er helt ny i clear aligner beh. og vil gerne have dig til at se på min case inden jeg går i gang, da jeg ikke selv kan forudse evt. komplikationer endnu. Er dette er muligt, hvordan foregår det så?Mvh Tandlæge Iben Schmidt   Du ønskes en god dag 😊 Tandlægerne i Tørring v/Iben SchmidtBredgade 567160 TørringTlf.nr.: 7580 1184Sikker mail : toerringtand@mail.dkFORTROLIGHED: Denne e-mail og evt. vedhæftede filer kan indeholde fortrolige oplysninger. Er du ikke rette modtager, bedes du venligst omgående underrette klinikken og derefter slette e-mailen og enhver vedhæftet fil uden at beholde en kopi og uden at videregive oplysninger om indholdet.Privatlivs- og cookiepolitik'
Agent replied: 'Dear  Toerringtand​Thank you for your message – we appreciate your trust in AlignerService.We’ve received your request, and the team has already begun processing it.If you’re submitting a new case, the dentist typically assigned to you has been notified and will review the case shortly.You'll hear from us as soon as your setup is ready for approval or if we need any further information to proceed.Please note that we handle all cases during normal business hours, and we do our best to ensure timely feedback.Warm regards,The AlignerService Teamtps@alignerservice.comAlignerservice.com'
Agent replied: 'Kære IbenTusind tak for din mail.Det kan du tro jeg kan.Vi komunikerer primært på mail.Der skriver du til mig hvilken system du bruger.Afhængig af system er der forskellige muligheder for mig at tilgå case og se billeder ogsv. på GDPR venlig måde.Jeg har vedhæftet en filr der visker hvordan du tilføjer os som collaborator på ClearCorrect og Sure Smile cases.Invisalign, TrioClear og Spark, har jeg brug for dit direkte log in, eller også skal du oprette en staff account.Så skrive r du til mig om hvad du ønsker.Initial case evaluering er gratis. Casen bliver indexeret nem, middel, svær eller henvisning.Skal vi hjælpe med at rette setuppet til så tager vi os betalt for dette. Vi kan også hjælpe med at lave orto journalen. Jeg har også vedhæftet vores prisliste.Sig endelig til hvis du har nogle spørgsmål. Book releaseMastering Aligner Orthodontics: A Guide for General DentistsCan be ordered at:Mastering Aligner Orthodontics | AlignerService.comOr buy directly on Amazonhttps://a.co/d/4pXzb1SKind regards / Venlig hilsen / Mit freundlichen Grüßen Helle Hatt DDSHelle@alignerservice.comAlignerservice.com-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------DisclaimerAlignerService consists of dentists and orthodontists with extensive clear aligner experience giving clinical advice to practising dentists and their teams. Based on information achieved through the doctor portal of the doctor's preferred clear aligner system (Invisalign, ClearCorrect, SureSmile, Spark), AlignerService offers tentative orthodontic diagnostics, orthodontic treatment planning, optimization of digital treatment plans, and treatment support. AlignerService never has physical contact with the patients or the doctor. subject: New clear correct case: Mia Zangerle Fall-Nr. 2102671
content:
Customer asked: 'Dear Helle,
this is our new clear correct case: 19 year old Mia Zangerle Fall-Nr. 2102671. She had 5 years ago an aligner treatment (which was not totally finished) but is very unhappy with her
 very prominent “rabbit teeth” 11 and 21. After an alignment of the Frontal arches I could do veneers on the second front teet, maybe even shorten the 11 and 21. Maybe you see other improvements also for the premolars, which have aready recessions and probably
 only very thin buccal bone. Very gratefull for your suggestions. I also send you the bite scans via WhatsApp for a better first impression and overview.
 
Best regards , Marcus
 
 
 

 
Dr. med. dent. Marcus Makowski
Praxisleiter swiss smile St. Moritz

Fra: Helle Hatt <tps@alignerservice.com>

Sendt: 9. maj 2025 11:26
Til: Glostrup Tandplejecenter <info@glostruptandplejecenter.dk>
Emne: Re: Indeksering


 


Kære Trine


 


Det kan du tro jeg vil.


 


Den tenderer til at være moderat, da det er relapse, som højst sandsynligt skyldes tunge funktionene, så denne skal også undersøges og arbejdes med, så tungen ikke ligger sig
 ud på tænderne og skubber dem frem.


Ingen molar bevægelser er nødvendige.


 


Behandlingstid 8-10 måneder.


 






















Book release

Mastering Aligner Orthodontics: A Guide for General Dentists

 


Can be ordered at:



Mastering Aligner Orthodontics | AlignerService.com


Or buy directly on Amazon


https://a.co/d/4pXzb1S




 



Kind regards / Venlig hilsen / Mit freundlichen Grüßen 
Helle Hatt DDS


 


Helle@alignerservice.com


Alignerservice.com


 


 



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Disclaimer


 


AlignerService consists of dentists and orthodontists with extensive clear aligner experience giving clinical
 advice to practising dentists and their teams. Based on information achieved through the doctor portal of the doctor's preferred clear aligner system (Invisalign, ClearCorrect, SureSmile, Spark), AlignerService offers tentative orthodontic diagnostics, orthodontic
 treatment planning, optimization of digital treatment plans, and treatment support. 





 
AlignerService never has physical contact with the
 patients or the doctor. As a consequence, neither AlignerService nor its employees can take any responsibility for the treatment outcomes. 

 
Any clear aligner software represents planned tooth
 movements based on a digital setup and does not reflect actual tooth movements; tooth movement data should be used as a reference only. The doctor is solely responsible for prescribing and administering orthodontic treatment and maintaining all patient medical
 records. 

 
Treatment Planning Services received from AlignerService
 shall only be considered as recommendations and the ultimate decision on whether or not to apply the Treatment Planning Services or to adapt them to the conditions of the specific patient remains with the treating doctor. 

 
AlignerService shall not become liable for any damages,
 claims, liabilities, etc. that may result or arise in context with the Treatment Planning Services provided to the doctor.
Clear aligner therapy is unpredictable. AlignerService
 does not guarantee a successful treatment outcome. Individual results will vary.

Agent replied: 'Dear CarolineThank you for your email.Case 2104650,It is a complex case. I would refer to an orthodontist.Case 2103405, It is a complex case. I would not recommend closing all the spaces orthodontically. It will decrease the space for the tongue too much and create sleep apnea.A compromise could be to close a little and enlarge the teeth with crowns or add an extra tooth.At least a two-package.Case 2096884It is a moderate but on the easier end. Lower solve with crown tipping, upper also crown tipping and rotation of the canine and extrusion.No molar movements and only slight premolar movements if any.A one package could probably do it, personally I prefer to have more than one revision, so I would choose a two.Book releaseMastering Aligner Orthodontics: A Guide for General DentistsCan be ordered at:Mastering Aligner Orthodontics | AlignerService.comOr buy directly on Amazonhttps://a.co/d/4pXzb1SKind regards / Venlig hilsen / Mit freundlichen Grüßen Helle Hatt DDSHelle@alignerservice.comAlignerservice.com-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------DisclaimerAlignerService consists of dentists and orthodontists with extensive clear aligner experience giving clinical advice to practising dentists and their teams. subject: Test 005
content:
Customer asked: 'Hi HelleThank you for the fast response. What IPR system do you recommend - if any?
Kind regardsDentist & ConsultantJesper HattHattConsulting.comT: +41 78 268 0078

Den 8. maj 2025 kl. 14.33 skrev Helle Hatt <helle@alignerservice.com>:Dear JesperThank you for your email.To improve the efficiency of your IPR (Interproximal Reduction) protocol, consider the following steps:

Use the Right Tools: Invest in high-quality IPR instruments designed for speed and precision. Diamond-coated strips or specialised IPR burs can significantly reduce the time needed for each procedure.

Plan Ahead: Before starting the IPR, ensure that you have a clear treatment plan. Use digital tools to visualise the amount of reduction needed for each tooth, which can help streamline the process.

Practice Technique: Familiarise yourself with the IPR technique through training videos or workshops. This can enhance your skill and speed during the procedure.

Patient Preparation: Ensure that your patients are well-informed about the process and comfortable during the procedure. This can help minimise delays and interruptions.

Follow a Step-by-Step Protocol: Implement a consistent protocol for IPR that includes specific steps for each patient. This can help you maintain a steady pace and reduce variability in your approach.

For materials, you can source IPR strips and burs from dental supply companies or online retailers that specialise in orthodontic tools. Look for products that are specifically designed for clear aligner treatments to ensure compatibility and effectiveness.By optimising your technique and using the right materials, you should be able to achieve a faster and more predictable IPR process.Best regards,
Helle HattBook releaseMastering Aligner Orthodontics: A Guide for General DentistsCan be ordered at:Mastering Aligner Orthodontics | AlignerService.comOr buy directly on Amazonhttps://a.co/d/4pXzb1SKind regards / Venlig hilsen / Mit freundlichen Grüßen Helle Hatt DDSHelle@alignerservice.comAlignerservice.com-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------DisclaimerAlignerService consists of dentists and orthodontists with extensive clear aligner experience giving clinical advice to practising dentists and their teams. Agent replied: 'Dear JesperThank you for your email.To improve the efficiency of your IPR (Interproximal Reduction) protocol, consider the following steps:


Use the Right Tools: Invest in high-quality IPR instruments designed for speed and precision. Diamond-coated strips or specialised IPR burs can significantly reduce the time needed for each procedure.


Plan Ahead: Before starting the IPR, ensure that you have a clear treatment plan. Use digital tools to visualise the amount of reduction needed for each tooth, which can help streamline the process.


Practice Technique: Familiarise yourself with the IPR technique through training videos or workshops. This can enhance your skill and speed during the procedure.


Patient Preparation: Ensure that your patients are well-informed about the process and comfortable during the procedure. This can help minimise delays and interruptions.


Follow a Step-by-Step Protocol: Implement a consistent protocol for IPR that includes specific steps for each patient. This can help you maintain a steady pace and reduce variability in your approach.


For materials, you can source IPR strips and burs from dental supply companies or online retailers that specialise in orthodontic tools. Look for products that are specifically designed for clear aligner treatments to ensure compatibility and effectiveness.
By optimising your technique and using the right materials, you should be able to achieve a faster and more predictable IPR process.
Best regards,

subject: First evalutation Case # 2105866
content:
Customer asked: 'Hi Helle!

Would like your first evalutation on this case # 2105866.

The patient would like to improve crowding upper and lower jaw. She thinks that 13, 23 has moved buccaly the past years. Not neccessary for her to replace 16 but maybe it would be good to open the space to be able to install a dental implant.




How long time would it take to impove crowding and open the space regio 16? And if she only want to correct the crowding and keep the space open, how long time would that take?

Is it a difficult/easy/medium case?





Kindest regards

 Josefin Fagerström

Legitimerad Tandläkare Oris Dental Nässjö

E-post: josefin.fagerstrom@orisdental.se'
Agent replied: 'Dear Josefine Fagerström​Thank you for your message – we appreciate your trust in AlignerService.We’ve received your request, and the team has already begun processing it.If you’re submitting a new case, the dentist typically assigned to you has been notified and will review the case shortly.You'll hear from us as soon as your setup is ready for approval or if we need any further information to proceed.Please note that we handle all cases during normal business hours, and we do our best to ensure timely feedback.Warm regards,The AlignerService Teamtps@alignerservice.comAlignerservice.com'
Agent replied: 'Dear JosefinThank you for your mail.It is a moderate case.You need to look out for the risk of worsening the recessions on 13,23.IPR is needed, definitely in the lower arch to keep a positive overjet.It is a bit difficult to see region 16,17,18, but it looks as if 27 has been tipped mesial. If that is the case, it is fairly easy to tip them back, but an extra would be needed to be more sure. I believe that it can be done within the same timeframe as correcting the front.The treatment time is about a year.Book releaseMastering Aligner Orthodontics: A Guide for General DentistsCan be ordered at:Mastering Aligner Orthodontics | AlignerService.comOr buy directly on Amazonhttps://a.co/d/4pXzb1SKind regards / Venlig hilsen / Mit freundlichen Grüßen Helle Hatt DDSHelle@alignerservice.comAlignerservice.com-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------DisclaimerAlignerService consists of dentists and orthodontists with extensive clear aligner experience giving clinical advice to practising dentists and their teams. subject: Kristine Ølgaard # 2105168
content:
Customer asked: 'Hej Helle,




Jeg er lige påbegyndt med håndtering af Clearcorrect, så mig vil du modtage mails fra fremover 🙂







Kristine har været hos mig med ønske om at tandregulering. 




Trangstilling OK, facialtstilld 3+, pt ikke tilfreds.




Pt har haft tandregulering i skoletandplejen, retentionstionstråd uk, men har ikke brugt retention i OK. 




Pt er tilfreds med UK, skal der stadigt bruges CC i uk?




Hvad kan vi gøre med overkæben?




Med venlig hilsen

Tandlæge Tobias Aurelsson

Godt Smil Hørsholm'
Customer asked: 'Hej Helle,

Selvtak! Jeg er enig – vi laver både OK og UK.

Jeg booker patienten ind igen til fjernelse af retentionstråd og ny scanning, efter hun godkendt behandlingen.

Bedste hilsner
Tobias


Fra: Helle Hatt <tps@alignerservice.com>
Sendt: 9. maj 2025 13:12
Til: Tobias Aurelsson <Tobias.Aurelsson@godtsmil.dk>
Emne: Re: Kristine Ølgaard # 2105168
 









Du får ikke ofte mails fra tps@alignerservice.com. 
Få mere at vide om, hvorfor dette er vigtigt 









 


Warning: This email originated from outside of Godt Smil’s trusted e-mail environment. Do not click any links or open attachments unless you recognize
 the sender and have confidence the content is safe.

 












Hej Tobias



Velkommen på holdet.



Tak for din mail.



Som jeg ser casen, så er det som oftes relapse hvor præmolarene begynder at kippe lingualt.

Hvis vi kun rette i OK så vil biddet ikke komme til at passe efterfølgende. Hvis vi kun koncentere os om OK fronten vil vi skulle lave en del IPR.



Så der er to løsninger som du kan høre.



Behandlingstid ca. 8-10 måneder.

Hvad kan vi gøre med overkæben?




Med venlig hilsen

Tandlæge Tobias Aurelsson

Godt Smil Hørsholm'

subject: WG: ClearCorrect Mare 2025
content:
Customer asked: 'Lieber Jesper,
 
nochmals herzlichen Dank für das großartige Treffen mit den Sprinz Brüdern.

Es ist immer eine Bereicherung für unsere Zusammenarbeit.
 
Des Weiteren wollte ich dich fragen, ob ihr du Interesse hättest, beim Mare Kongress vom 09.10. bis 11.10. in Rovinj eine Session zu übernehmen, vorausgesetzt, du hast Zeit.

Wir haben dort einen Messestand und würden uns sehr freuen, wenn du dabei sein könntest.
Anbei das voraussichtliche Programm vom Kongress.
 
Ich freue mich auf deine Rückmeldung.
 
 
Liebe Grüße,
 

 
Edith
